00043 QVariant OtherClockDriversModel::data( const QModelIndex& index, 
00044                                                                           int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00045         
00046 
00047         if (!index.isValid())
00048                 return QVariant();
00049 
00050         // if row is invalid
00051         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00052                 return QVariant();
00053 
00054         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00055 
00056                 switch (index.column()) {
00057                         case 0:
00058                                 return table_.value(index.row())->getClockName();
00059                         case 1:
00060                                 return table_.value(index.row())->getClockSource();
00061                         case 2:
00062                                 return table_.value(index.row())->getClockPeriod()->value_;
00063                         case 3:
00064                                 return General::timeUnit2Str(
00065                                         table_.value(index.row())->getClockPeriod()->timeUnit_);
00066                         case 4:
00067                                 return table_.value(index.row())->getClockPulseOffset()->value_;
00068                         case 5:
00069                                 return General::timeUnit2Str(
00070                                         table_.value(index.row())->getClockPulseOffset()->timeUnit_);
00071                         case 6:
00072                                 return table_.value(index.row())->getClockPulseValue()->value_;
00073                         case 7:
00074                                 return table_.value(index.row())->getClockPulseDuration()->value_;
00075                         case 8:
00076                                 return General::timeUnit2Str(
00077                                         table_.value(index.row())->getClockPulseDuration()->timeUnit_);
00078                         default:
00079                                 return QVariant();
00080 
00081                 }
00082         }
00083 
00084         // is unsupported role
00085         else {
00086                 return QVariant();
00087         }

00130 bool OtherClockDriversModel::setData( const QModelIndex& index, 
00131                                                                          const QVariant& value, 
00132                                                                          int role /*= Qt::EditRole */ ) {
00133 
00134         if (!index.isValid())
00135                 return false;
00136 
00137         // if row is invalid
00138         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00139                 return false;
00140 
00141         if (role == Qt::EditRole) {
00142 
00143                 switch (index.column()) {
00144                         case 0: {
00145                                 table_.value(index.row())->setClockName(value.toString());
00146                                 break;
00147                                         }
00148                         case 1: {
00149                                 table_.value(index.row())->setClockSource(value.toString());
00150                                 break;
00151                                         }
00152                         case 2: {
00153                                 table_.value(index.row())->getClockPeriod()->value_ = value.toDouble();
00154                                 break;
00155                                         }
00156                         case 3: {
00157                                 table_.value(index.row())->getClockPeriod()->timeUnit_ = 
00158                                         General::str2TimeUnit(value.toString(), General::NS);
00159                                 break;
00160                                         }
00161                         case 4: {
00162                                 table_.value(index.row())->getClockPulseOffset()->value_ = value.toDouble();
00163                                 break;
00164                                         }
00165                         case 5: {
00166                                 table_.value(index.row())->getClockPulseOffset()->timeUnit_ =
00167                                         General::str2TimeUnit(value.toString(), General::NS);
00168                                 break;
00169                                         }
00170                         case 6: {
00171                                 table_.value(index.row())->getClockPulseValue()->value_ = value.toInt();
00172                                 break;
00173                                         }
00174                         case 7: {
00175                                 table_.value(index.row())->getClockPulseDuration()->value_ = value.toDouble();
00176                                 break;
00177                                         }
00178                         case 8: {
00179                                 table_.value(index.row())->getClockPulseDuration()->timeUnit_ =
00180                                         General::str2TimeUnit(value.toString(), General::NS);
00181                                 break;
00182                                         }
00183                         default:
00184                                 return false;
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 emit contentChanged();
00188                 return true;
00189         }
00190 
00191         // if unsupported role
00192         else {
00193                 return false;
00194         }
